page.title: 05GOLF : PONY TREKKING - ARRAN
page.content:
{GOLF: }The Golf Course in Brodick has 18 holes and is 4404 yards in length - par 62. The course is situated along the bay with beautiful views out to sea and the Ayrshire Coast beyond. Visitors may play a round on this course for Â£4.50, Juniors Â£2.25.
{PONY TREKKING:}Another way to enjoy the scenery and explore the local area and its glens is on horseback. Horses and Ponies can be hired from Glen Rosa Farm Stables and Clay Burn Trekking Centre. The charge would be Â£3.00 per ride of approximately one hour. Half and full day treks are made by special arrangement.
